queries.query: small plant creature that can camouflage in foliage and retaliates with thorny spikes
queries.variant: small creature made of plants that hides in bushes and hits back with bramble spikes

queries.query: guardian of the woods with the ability to resist exhaustion and communicate in Sylvan
queries.variant: woodland guardian that can speak Sylvan and is immune to fatigue

queries.query: plant being that moves through plants easily and strikes with a wooden axe
queries.variant: plant creature that navigates through vegetation without trouble and attacks with a wood axe

queries.query: plant monster with darkvision and abilities to attack both in melee and from a distance
queries.variant: plant creature with the ability to see in darkness and attack close range and afar

queries.query: creature that embodies nature, has high stealth in wooded areas and can climb
queries.variant: nature spirit that is very sneaky in forests and is able to climb easily
